statements: SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY sale_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount, MIN(sale_amount) AS min_sale_amount FROM Sales;
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sale_amount FROM Sales;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM Sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE quantity_sold > 100;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_date = '2022-11-30';
SELECT sales_id, product_id, quantity_sold FROM SalesData WHERE product_id = 123;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM SalesData WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY product_id, forecast_date ASC;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM SalesData WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC, sale_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(quantity_sold) AS max_quantity_sold, AVG(quantity_sold) AS avg_quantity_sold FROM SalesData;

SELECT sales_id, product_id, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM SalesData JOIN DemandForecast ON SalesData.product_id = DemandForecast.product_id WHERE SalesData.quantity_sold > 50 AND DemandForecast.forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY SaleData.sale_date ASC, DemandForecast.forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, sales_date, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand, forecast_date FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecasted_sales_amount FROM sales_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sales_amount, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY sales_amount HAVING total_sales > 5000;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date DESC
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecasted_demand < 500 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC
SELECT product_id, MAX(sales_amount) AS max_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id
SELECT forecasted_sales_amount, forecast_date FROM sales_forecast WHERE forecast_date = '2022-08-15'
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand, forecast_date FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY forecast_date
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT date, quantity, product_id FROM sales_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_data WHERE price < 50;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT forecast_date, predicted_demand FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date;
SELECT * FROM product_data WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id=1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT forecast_date, predicted_demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PastSalesData
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM PastSalesData GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM ForecastingModels WHERE model_type = 'Regression'
SELECT model_name, model_type FROM ForecastingModels ORDER BY model_name DESC
SELECT date, product_id, demand_quantity FROM HistoricalDemand WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM PastSalesData WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, product_id, quantity_sold FROM PastSalesData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT channel_name, region FROM SalesChannels WHERE channel_type = 'Online' AND region = 'US' ORDER BY channel_name;
SELECT model_name, model_type, training_data_table FROM ForecastingModels WHERE model_type = 'Regression' ORDER BY model_name;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecasts WHERE forecasted_quantity < 500 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
